keyMoments.title: First Visual Armament Haki
keyMoments.description: Luffy demonstrates Armament Haki for the first time in the anime, marking a major milestone in the arc.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the visual representation of Haki that will define New World battles.

keyMoments.title: Wadatsumi Introduction
keyMoments.description: Wadatsumi makes his first appearance, introducing a key character for the Fish-Man Island conflict.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a member of the Flying Pirates who will play a role in the arc's conflicts.

keyMoments.title: Flying Dutchman Appears
keyMoments.description: The Flying Dutchman emerges, foreshadowing Vander Decken IX's role in the arc.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up one of the arc's major antagonists and plot threads.

description: The Fish-Man Island Arc follows the Straw Hats as they journey to Fish-Man Island, 10,000 meters under the sea. This arc showcases their post-timeskip abilities and involves them in the conflicts surrounding the island, including the Vander Decken IX and Hody Jones threats.
